#### PR validation:

```
cmsRun test/python/testTracker2021Geometry.py >Tracker2021.log
cmsShow -c overlaps.fwc --sim-geom-file cmsDD4HepGeom.root --tgeo-name=CMS


Path:
/Tracker_2/TIDB_2
````
title: DD4hep: Tracker overlaps TIB
